starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.model

Class Ballot

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.MegaMawile.model.Ballot

  • public class Ballot
extends java.lang.Object
    Ballots are used to tally the client's votes on drafted policies during the voting phase. They are ideally created at the start of each voting phase. When a Ballot is instantiated, a list of cards is set, analogous to questions on a regular voting ballot.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ballot

        public Ballot(java.util.ArrayList<PolicyCard> ballots)
        Creates a Ballot for a player from a list of PolicyCards.
        Parameters:
        ballots - a list of PolicyCards on which the player will vote.

    • Method Detail

      • getBallotItems

        public java.util.HashMap<PolicyCard,VoteType> getBallotItems()
        Returns a list of PolicyCards mapped to the number of votes for that card. The enacting region can be determined by querying the PolicyCard.
        Returns:
        a hashmap, where keys are PolicyCards mapped to integers indicating the number of votes recieved.

      • getVotingHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<PolicyCard> getVotingHand()
        Returns the list of policy cards to be voted on using this Ballot.
        Returns:
        the list of PolicyCards voted on by this Ballot, as an ArrayList.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the Ballot so that it may be reused in a new voting round.
